Text

```js
//change width by relative '100%' or absolute 900
const style = { width: "100%" };
<TabBar style={style}>
  <Tab active>Item one</Tab>
  <Tab>Item two</Tab>
  <Tab>3</Tab>
</TabBar>;
```

Icons:

```js
//change width by relative '100%' or absolute 900
const style = { width: "100%" };
<TabBar icons style={style}>
  <Tab>
    <TabIcon>phone</TabIcon>
  </Tab>
  <Tab active>
    <TabIcon>favorite</TabIcon>
  </Tab>
  <Tab>
    <TabIcon>account_circle</TabIcon>
  </Tab>
</TabBar>;
```

Icons and text:

```js
//change width by relative '100%' or absolute 900
const style = { width: "100%" };
<TabBar iconsWithText style={style}>
  <Tab>
    <TabIcon>phone</TabIcon>
    <TabText>Recents</TabText>
  </Tab>
  <Tab>
    <TabIcon>favorite</TabIcon>
    <TabText>Favorites</TabText>
  </Tab>
  <Tab active>
    <TabIcon>account_circle</TabIcon>
    <TabText>Account</TabText>
  </Tab>
</TabBar>;
```

Controlled (values)

```js
class TabsExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: "H" };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <Tabs
          value={this.state.value}
          onChange={value => this.setState({ value })}
        >
          <Tab value="H">Hungerford</Tab>
          <Tab value="P">Portland</Tab>
          <Tab value="C">Chicago</Tab>
        </Tabs>
        <p>Currently selected value: {this.state.value}</p>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<TabsExample />;
```

Controlled (index)

```js
class TabsExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { index: 0, tabs: ["Tab 1", "Tab 2", "Tab 3"] };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <TabBar>
          {this.state.tabs.map((tab, index) => (
            <Tab
              key={index}
              active={index === this.state.index}
              onClick={() => this.setState({ index })}
            >
              {tab}
            </Tab>
          ))}
        </TabBar>
        <p>Currently selected index: {this.state.index}</p>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<TabsExample />;
```

Tabs in Toolbar

```js
<Toolbar>
  <ToolbarRow>
    <ToolbarSection align="start">
      <ToolbarIcon menu />
      <ToolbarTitle>Toolbar</ToolbarTitle>
    </ToolbarSection>
    <ToolbarSection align="end" shrinkToFit>
      <ToolbarIcon>file_download</ToolbarIcon>
      <ToolbarIcon>print</ToolbarIcon>
      <ToolbarIcon>bookmark</ToolbarIcon>
    </ToolbarSection>
  </ToolbarRow>
  <ToolbarRow>
    <ToolbarSection align="start">
      <Tabs>
        <Tab active>Item one</Tab>
        <Tab>Item two</Tab>
        <Tab>3</Tab>
      </Tabs>
    </ToolbarSection>
  </ToolbarRow>
</Toolbar>
```
